A: Who angered pig? (a) Tortoise (b) Tortoise's wife (c) Wife
Whose wife is in the story? (a) Pig's wife (b) Tortoise's wife (c) Elephant's wife
Who did Tortoise borrow from? (a) Pig (b) Dog (c) Elephant
Where did Pig ask for money? (a) Tortoise's farm (b) Tortoise's house (c) Elephant's house
B: Short forms: My friend _________ arrive yet. (has not)
Short forms: I _________ going to be seven next week. (am)
Short forms: The pupils _________ in the assembly hall. (are not)
Short forms: The workers _________ been paid. (have not)
Short forms: Tolulope _________ travel again yesterday. (did not)
Capitalize: john is my best friend. _________
